content: ####size finished size depends on thread used with size 30 thread approximately 6-1/2 inches in diameter with size 10 and a #7 steel hook approx 10 to 10-1/4 inches requires 4 colors white green yellow and pink the version updated and reworked by jennie gaskin called victorian rose doily is offline as of 2012-10-2 jennie s version used 3 colors ecru green and pink and worked up to 11-1/2 inches in diameter > raveler errata there is a mistake on round 2 of centerpiece pattern it says repeat 8 times but it should be 9 times
